reviews.title: By far the best sniper game I could find
reviews.comment: I tried several other games of similar design and only two of them worked on my phone properly, this and Snipe.  This game feels similar but better in every way.  A truly great game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: Makes my phone run extremely hot for sub par graphics and game play. Stupid levels like aliens with force fields. Waste of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC sensation XE
reviews.comment: Rubbish, crashes as soon as you load campaign mode on single player. Worst app I have ever downloaded.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good shooter
reviews.comment: Fun shooter game,if you like this game check out snipe,I like that one a little better,but all n all this is a good game.fun to kill time and kill other ppl.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but repetitive and technical issues.
reviews.comment: This is a fun game for a while but control issues, memory problems and repetitive game play wear thin quick.  Multiplayer is good idea but control issues make it pointless. Needs more variety.  Also,I am running this on an Epic 4g Galaxy S phone and the tilt controls need some adjustment. It only allows me to move side to side or down, not up, so I have to zoom out and recenter if I drop to low. Stupid! Also there are some tech issues as I have to reboot phone after use to get rid of lag and memory problem
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Wish you could control breathing. Also would be nice to select different rifles and equipment like in other sniper games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boring and difficult to control
reviews.comment: Just missed the 15 minute window or I\'d refund.

reviews.title: Fun game

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Its very difficult to maneuver screen and aim to shoot.The settings need to be revised!!

reviews.title: Tablet issues
reviews.comment: Tilting sideways on an ASUS Transformer moves the scope up and down. Can\'t move view left or right. Makes it unplayable on this tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gyro axis is wrong on the Xoom
reviews.comment: Tilting the Xoom sideways moves the scope up/down.
